heading: HB08428
0: AN ACT MANDATING ALL CABLE SERVICE COMPANIES INCLUDING ELECTRIC AND TELECOMMUNICATIONS COMPANIES TO BUNDLE THEIR WIRES IN SUCH MANNER AS TO PRECLUDE THEM FROM DANGLING MIDAIR AND PRESCRIBING PENALTIES FOR VIOLATION THEREOF AND FOR OTHER PURPOSES
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HB08428
FULL TITLE : AN ACT MANDATING ALL CABLE SERVICE COMPANIES INCLUDING ELECTRIC AND TELECOMMUNICATIONS COMPANIES TO BUNDLE THEIR WIRES IN SUCH MANNER AS TO PRECLUDE THEM FROM DANGLING MIDAIR AND PRESCRIBING PENALTIES FOR VIOLATION THEREOF AND FOR OTHER PURPOSES
